mapper.select: select a.`id`, u.`name` as `owner`, a.`name`, a.`startDate`, a.`endDate`, a.`cost`, a.`description`, a.`createTime`, a.`createBy`, a.`editTime`, a.`editBy` from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on a.`owner` = u.`id` where a.`id` = #{id}

select car.`id` as `id`, u.`name` as `owner`, a.`name`, a.`startDate`, a.`endDate` from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.`id` = a.`owner` inner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on car.`activityId` = a.`id` where car.`clueId` = #{clueId}

select a.`id`, u.`name` as `owner`, a.`name`, a.`startDate`, a.`endDate` from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_user u on u.`id`=a.`owner` where a.`id` not in ( select a.`id` from tbl_activity a inner join tbl_clue_activity_relation car on car.`activityId`=a.`id` inner join tbl_user u on u.`id`=a.`owner` where car.`clueId`=#{clueId} )
